page.title: 15Work in Orwell & Milnathort
page.content: Agriculture and its related work accounts for most employment in this area. Although the farms are highly mechanized there are certain times of the year and some crops that need a large workforce. The potato harvest this year required much more manual labour than usual where fields were too soft for potato harvesting machin- ery. Mr Moran employs mainly women seasonal workers in his potato squads. Mr Eadie also hires local labour when needed in season and for work in his potato store. The blacksmith and the garages must be able to deal with farm machinery. In Milnathort(the part in our block) there are 15 shops employing about 40 people, other employment accounting for about another 40. Many are women, some part-time. Some people work in other towns
